text:
If Tomcat receives an HTTP/0.9 protocol request (iow, a request without the 
HTTP/1.0 appended to the request line), it doesn't respond even after receiving 
the empty line to end the request.  This may be an issue with manual telnet 
connections or connections from poorly written robots.

To reproduce:

telnet localhost 8080
GET /index.html<enter>
<enter>

You'll see no response.

-jh-
creator: jhunter@apache.org
remm@apache.org
text:
True, I'll slightly modify the Socket IS to handle this case when I rewrite the 
connector.
